name: ITC Windsor, Bengaluru
shortDescription: Celebrate in Victorian elegance at ITC Windsor Bengaluru, a heritage manor hotel offering old-world charm, beautiful gardens, and ITC's culinary excellence for sophisticated celebrations.
longDescription:
ITC Windsor Bengaluru preserves the gracious atmosphere of a colonial-era manor house, offering couples seeking heritage charm in India's tech capital a venue of distinctive character. With its white-columned facades, manicured gardens, and interiors that celebrate a gentler era, Windsor provides an elegant alternative to contemporary venues.

The hotel's 240 rooms and suites blend period aesthetics with modern comforts. The gardens, rare in urban Bengaluru, provide outdoor celebration spaces with mature trees and classic landscaping. The ballrooms offer refined indoor settings.
metaTitle: ITC Windsor Bengaluru Wedding | Heritage Manor Wedding Venue
metaDescription: Host your elegant wedding at ITC Windsor Bengaluru. Colonial manor charm, beautiful gardens, and ITC hospitality for celebrations up to 500 guests.
address: 25, Golf Course Road, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560052, India
